EmailTemplate.subject: We Appreciate Your Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LegalZoom.com
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom. View online
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We greatly value our customers' opinions and would appreciate you taking a moment to rate your recent experience with LegalZoom. Your comments will help other customers and provide useful feedback to LegalZoom.
Thank you again for being a LegalZoom customer.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
